ai-tika-vin07t14:2_0: And they ruined to the three kinds of acknowledgment in the Monastic Law, scoopt, and the lotus ponds—
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation is unrelated to a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_1: He needed what is beneficial for this, but only what it wants is.
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_2: like a fish caught in a big trap.
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_3: undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life.
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_5: They should be extinguished between the shoulders.
ai-tika-vin07t14:4_0: And so, though they speak of this discussion on the Monastic Law, each other in accordance with the Monastic Law.
ai-tika-vin07t14:5_0: The Analysis of nuns is finished.
ai-tika-vin07t14:6_0: The discussion of the communities of both monks and the one who did not reply.
ai-tika-vin07t14:7_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
